name: Steel

pages.text: Steel is an advanced material which can be used to create tools and armor, and comes in a few different varieties: $(thing)Steel$(), $(thing)Black Steel$(), $(thing)Red Steel$(), and $(thing)Blue Steel$().$(br2)In order to create steel, you must first create $(thing)Pig Iron$() in a $(l:mechanics/blast_furnace)Blast Furnace$(), and cast it into $(thing)Ingots$().
A $(thing)Pig Iron Ingot$() can then be worked in an anvil to create a $(thing)High Carbon Steel$() ingot, which can be worked again to create a $(thing)Steel Ingot$()

$(thing)Black Steel$() is an advanced form of steel formed from an alloy of steel, along with some other metals. In order to create it, you will need to create an alloy called $(thing)Weak Steel$() in a $(l:mechanics/crucible)Crucible$().
pages.title: Black Steel
Weak Steel
pages.text: $(br)$(bold)Requirements:$()$(br)$(li)50 - 70 % : $(thing)Steel$()$(li)15 - 25 % : $(thing)Nickel$()$(li)15 - 25 % : $(thing)Black_Bronze$()$(br2)Molten $(thing)Weak Steel$() can then be cast into ingots.

$(thing)Weak Steel Ingots$() can then be welded with $(thing)Pig Iron Ingots$() to create $(thing)High Carbon Black Steel Ingots$(). Finally, these can then be worked on an $(l:mechanics/anvil)Anvil$() to create $(thing)Black Steel Ingots$().

$(thing)Black Steel$() can be used to craft tools and armor, and also is used as a key ingredient in the creation of $(l:mechanics/steel#blue_steel)Blue Steel$() and $(l:mechanics/steel#red_steel)Red Steel$().

$(thing)Blue Steel$() is one of the two highest forms of steel able to be created, along with $(l:mechanics/steel#red_steel)Red Steel$(). Similar to $(l:mechanics/steel#black_steel)Black Steel$(), the first step is to create an alloy of $(thing)Weak Blue Steel$() $(l:mechanics/crucible)Crucible$().
pages.title: Blue Steel

pages.text: $(thing)Weak Blue Steel Ingots$() can then be welded with $(l:mechanics/steel#black_steel)Black Steel Ingots$() to create $(thing)High Carbon Blue Steel Ingots$(). Finally, these can then be worked on an $(l:mechanics/anvil)Anvil$() to create $(thing)Blue Steel Ingots$().

$(thing)Blue Steel$() is one of the two strongest tier metals in TerraFirmaCraft, along with $(l:mechanics/steel#red_steel)Red Steel$(). It can be used to create tools and armor, and a $(thing)Blue Steel Bucket$(). The blue steel bucket is a powerful bucket able of transporting source blocks of lava and molten metals. Blue steel is also used as a crafting ingredient in one of the most rare after items in the game... a $(thing)Bucket$().

$(thing)Red Steel$() is one of the two highest forms of steel able to be created, along with $(l:mechanics/steel#blue_steel)Blue Steel$(). Similar to $(l:mechanics/steel#black_steel)Black Steel$(), the first step is to create an alloy of $(thing)Weak Red Steel$() $(l:mechanics/crucible)Crucible$().

$(thing)Red Steel$() is one of the two strongest tier metals in TerraFirmaCraft, along with $(l:mechanics/steel#blue_steel)Blue Steel$().
